tool.name: Place Seqs
tool.command: #if $ref_dir.selector == "custom" mkdir -p custom/ && mv $ref_dir.pro_ref_fna custom/pro_ref.fna && mv $ref_dir.pro_ref_hmm custom/pro_ref.hmm && mv $ref_dir.pro_ref_model custom/pro_ref.model && mv $ref_dir.pro_ref_tre custom/pro_ref.tre && #end if #if $intermediate_check mkdir -p intermediate/place_seqs && #end if place_seqs.py --study_fasta '$study_fasta' --placement_tool '$placement_tool' #if $ref_dir.selector == "custom" --ref_dir 'custom' #else if $ref_dir.selector == "fungi" --ref_dir 'fungi' #end if --out_tree 'out_tree.tre' --processes "\${GALAXY_SLOTS:-1}" #if $intermediate_check --intermediate 'intermediate_out' #end if --min_align $min_align --chunk_size $chunk_size $verbose #if $intermediate_check && zip -r intermediate_out.zip intermediate_out/ #end if

param.label: Placement tool to use when placing sequences into reference tree

param.name: selector
param.label: Argument specifying non-default reference files to use for sequence placement
param.option: Default directory containing reference sequence files of prokaryotic 16S rRNA gene alignment
Direct to the fungal ITS files

param.name: pro_ref_fna
param.label: Fasta file for the reference database of the sequesnces

param.name: pro_ref_hmm
param.label: HMM file for the reference database of the sequesnces

param.name: pro_ref_model
param.label: Model file for the reference database of the sequesnces

param.name: pro_ref_tre
param.label: Tree file for the reference database of the sequesnces

param.name: intermediate_check
param.label: Output folder for intermediate files
param.help: Intermediate output files will be deleted by default

param.label: Proportion of the total length of an input query sequence that must align with reference sequences
param.help: Any sequences with lengths below this value after making an alignment with reference sequences will be excluded from the placement and all subsequent steps.

param.label: Number of query seqs to read in at once for EPA-ng
If specified, print out wrapped commands and other details

tool.help:
@HELP_HEADER@
Place Seqs (Sequence placement) =============================== Script to run EPA-ng and GAPPA to place study sequences (i.e. OTUs or ASVs) into a reference tree.
Note ==== This is typically done to prep for subsequent hidden-state prediction with PICRUSt2. Requires unaligned FASTA of study sequences. Users can specify a non-default reference files if needed.
Input ===== The study sequences (i.e. FASTA of amplicon sequence variants or operational taxonomic units)
Output ====== Output tree with placed study sequences.
